headline: Portuguese Sweet Rice
name: Portuguese Sweet Rice
description: Stovetop rice pudding with eggs added at the very end for a rich texture.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan over high heat combine sugar and milk. When bubbles form at the edges, stir in rice and reduce heat to medium-low. Cook 60 minutes, stirring often, until rice is tender. Do not allow to boil.
Remove from heat and vigorously stir in beaten eggs, a little at a time, until well incorporated. Serve warm.
